snippet: About twice a day, taxi passengers in New York have something nice to say about their cabbies — taking the unusual step of filing a compliment with the city.
abstract: Some New York City taxi passengers, about two daily, are so impressed with their cabdrivers that they take unusual step of contacting city's 311 Web site to file compliments; examples of effusive comments from pleased passengers are noted.
lead_paragraph: About twice a day, taxi passengers in New York have something nice to say about their cabbies — taking the unusual step of filing a compliment with the city.

headline.seo: Sometimes, New York Taxi Riders Find Cabby Worth Praising
headline.main: Sometimes, Riders Find a Cabby Worth Praising
headline.print_headline: Sometimes, Riders Find a Cabby Worth Praising
